body: According to the README fgs is a required build_target and was not included in the original package. Also modified the build process to deal with potential race condition that arises from running `'make' '-j8' 'clean' 'hmm.obj' 'fgs'` which is the default make command that arises when specifying `build_targets = ['clean', 'hmm.obj']`
title: Added Version 1.30. Fixed Build Issues
